Punishment Commands.
ban - Used to kick and ban a named player.
Usage - //ban char_name days reason
unban - Used to unban a named player.
Usage - //unban char_name
ban_hwid - Used to kick player and ban a hwid.
Usage - //ban_hwid hwid
unban_hwid - Used to unban a hwid.
Usage - //unban_hwid hwid
kick - Used to disconnect named player.
Usage - //kick char_name
accban - Used to kick and ban a named account.
Usage - //accban account minutes
accunban - Used to unban a named account.
Usage - //accunban account
banchat - Used to ban chat for player.
Usage - //banchat char_name minutes reason
unbanchat - Used to unban chat for player.
Usage - //unbanchat char_name
jail - Used to jail the player.
Usage - //jail char_name minutes reason
unjail - Used to unjail the player.
Usage - //unban account
permaban - Used to kick and ban a player account.
Usage - //permaban char_name
charip - Show a player ip address.
Usage - //charip char_name
Advanced Commands, Page 2 Modify Commands, Page 4
